extendedInfo.description: ******This is a Private Beta Application. Join the WAITLIST on www.fieldlens.com to get a BETA INVITE soon******* FieldLens enables everyone on a construction project to create, communicate and resolve issues instantly from anywhere.FieldLens is different. Set up a project in seconds. React to field issues instantly. Use FieldLens alone or invite your entire project team. A flexible solution that makes jobs of all sizes more efficient.Key Features:- Design consultants, general contractors, and project owners can create project deficiencies and safety issues direct from their smartphone, seamlessly including video, pictures, voicenotes, and more.- Subcontractors can react to assigned issues with status updates, multimedia, questions, comments and more.- All communication occurs in real time - whether you are using a smartphone, tablet, or computer.- All users can create project observations and issue custom reports to anyone via pdf, spreadsheet, or link to a web based report that includes rich multimedia.- Create drafts in the field and seamlessly finish your work in the office.- FieldLens works fully offline - an internet connection is not required to view existing issues or create new ones.- Create custom newsfeeds - quickly filtering by issues that matter to you. Subscribe to email or push notifications for any pertinent issue.- All users have access to the project directory via FieldLens - no more hunting for contact information for the project team.

reviews.title: Fast & Easy to use
reviews.comment: This app is great for construction site supervision.  Including daily logs, tracking of issues, second tier subcontractors, and logging decisions made in the field.
reviews.author: Byron Gehrig
